meanings.definition: A crumbly topping made of flour, sugar, and butter, typically used on baked goods such as coffee cake.
meanings.sent1: The streusel on top of the muffin added a delicious crunch.
meanings.sent2: I love the way streusel tastes on blueberry crumble bars.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole all the streusel from the bakery!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweet streusel that made the cake special.
meanings.sent5: The golden streusel sparkled under the bakery lights.

meanings.definition: A type of pastry dough that is layered with streusel filling before baking.
meanings.sent1: The baker carefully spread the streusel filling on the dough.
meanings.sent2: The streusel inside the pastry added a delightful sweetness.
meanings.sent3: The streusel dough was so flaky, it reminded me of a puff pastry cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as the streusel in the freshly baked pie.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the streusel filled the kitchen with a cozy feeling.
